data.text:
@metoffice Yeah, and they hope to respond "within 5-7 working days".
That is bloody useless!!
Thanks for nothing!
You know what the issue is, I told you - Why can't you just FIX IT??
@potter2207 Good morning, please could you email enquiries@metoffice.gov.uk and we will be able to provide some further information regarding this. ^Hannah
